In exercise of powers conferred under rule 3(2)(b), 16(1}(a)(b), 61(1) and 62 Aircraft

Purpose of the safety and security of passengers, crew, ground personnel and general
Public in all matters relating to safeguarding against acts of interference with civil
aviation. directs for partial modification of this Bureau, AvSee Circular No. 5/2018
dated 9.10.2018 issued on the subject matter.

dated 9.10.2018- "As mentioned in para 4 (f) of Cabinet Secretariat Jammer
guidelines 2023, the Frequency Jammers shall be procured only from Bharat
Electronic Limited (Model No. "MINI JAMMER MK-Ill SYSTEMS") or Electronics
Corporation of India Limited (Model No. BC-SPJE-400").”

3. The other contents of the AvSec Circular No. 5/2018 dated 9.08. 2018 shall
remain unchanged. All concerned shall implement this with immediate effect.
